channel.title: Adding nat altar..(global object) help plz?
channel.description:
ok so i got the nat rift ID, when i add it which i know works i cannot see the altar, only walk around it, lol, so therfore i dont get the craft-nature options...please help?
Ps. here is my makeGlobal object code for it...
[code]
makeGlobalObject(3215, 3079, 7133, 0, 10);//
[/code]
Why dont i see it?? :O

item.title: Adding nat altar..(global object) help plz?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Tried silabs, no good. still not there lol.

i know its in a sense “there” but i cant see or use it. when i try and stand on the coords it is plotted at my character dont move and if i go to the coord behind it my player runs around the spot, so i know its “there”, any help???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 27, 2008, 09:25:05 AM[/size][hr]is it something to do with the 10 on the coding? i dont really know what the 10 is for but its a 10 for every other object so i just put it for this lol…maybe its the 10? maybe i need to make it a diff number???

Read full topic
item.source: Adding nat altar..(global object) help plz?
